Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.LewisFlowers_Te: {Text} Anyone who ships 40 {Crop:TextPlural} on time will earn a substantial reward from the Pelican Town Agricultural Fund.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.LewisFlowers_RE: {Crop:TextPlural} are in high demand this year.
Apparently, {Crop:TextPlural} are the latest trend in Zuzu City.
A brand is making research for their new perfume and need high amount of {Crop:Text}.
A popular decorator is using {Crop:Text}. Now everyone in the world wants one!
For the Flower Dance, Pelican Town is highly in need of {Crop:TextPlural}.
Zuzu City is holding their traditional flower parade in the end of Summer. There is now a huge demand in {Crop:TextPlural}.
The annual flower bouquet contest is in need of material and wants {Crop:TextPlural}.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.LewisHundredFlo: {Text} Anyone who ships 100 flowers on time will earn a substantial reward from the Pelican Town Agricultural Fund.
Flowers are an important theme in a new trend of decoration that is rising recently.
A big company wants to study flower petals for a fabric they're making.
Zuzu City 'Sweet Day' is incoming. People offers gifts to each other, and flowers is a popular one.
The 'Best Perfumer Nose' contest is happening soon and flowers are needed for one of the test.
As winter comes closer, people want flowers around them to bring joy and color in their life.
